sky_ad:
CREATE TABLE `sky_ad` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `tag_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `title` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `info` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '简介',
  `link1` varchar(400) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '链接1',
  `link2` varchar(400) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '链接2',
  `starttime` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '开始时间',
  `endtime` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结束时间',
  `imgurl` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图片地址',
  `imgurl2` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '图像2',
  `orderindex` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间',
  `price` decimal(9,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '价格',
  `object_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '具体对象id',
  `tag_id_2nd` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `checkbox_attr` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `tag_id` (`tag_id`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_ad_tags:
CREATE TABLE `sky_ad_tags` (
  `tag_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `orderindex` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `pid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `m` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT 'index',
  `a` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default',
  `width` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `height` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `tagno` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`tag_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_admin:
CREATE TABLE `sky_admin` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `username` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户名',
  `password` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '密码',
  `salt` smallint(6) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '随机密码串',
  `group_id` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '用户组',
  `isfounder` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否创建人',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='管理员'
sky_admin_group:
CREATE TABLE `sky_admin_group` (
  `id` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `orderindex` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序',
  `content` text CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL COMMENT '权限内容',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_apppush:
CREATE TABLE `sky_apppush` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `token` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `clientid` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `appname` varchar(16) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `appid` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `appkey` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `userid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户',
  `shopadmin` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `openid` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='app推送'
sky_apppush_plan:
CREATE TABLE `sky_apppush_plan` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `pid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `typeid` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '推送方式',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态 0未推送 1已推送',
  `content` text CHARACTER SET utf8 COMMENT '内容',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `issuccess` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否成功',
  `errmsg` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `dateline` (`dateline`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='推送计划'
sky_article:
CREATE TABLE `sky_article` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题',
  `catid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分类',
  `catid_top` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '一级分类',
  `catid_2nd` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '二级分类',
  `love_num` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '喜欢数',
  `fav_num` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '收藏数',
  `description` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '描述',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态 2显示 其他隐藏',
  `is_recommend` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否推荐 1推荐 ',
  `imgurl` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图片',
  `createtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '2018-09-10 09:01:01' COMMENT '创建时间',
  `comment_num` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '评论数',
  `tpl` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `author` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `isnew` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '最新',
  `ishot` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '最热',
  `view_num` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '访问数',
  `price` decimal(9,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '产品价格',
  `market_price` decimal(9,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '市场价格',
  `total_num` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '库存数',
  `sold_num` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '销售数',
  `grade` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `downurl` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '下载地址',
  `downsize` decimal(9,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00',
  `videourl` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `isindex` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否首页',
  `tags` varchar(128) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '标签',
  `imgsdata` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图集',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `catid` (`catid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT
sky_article_comment:
CREATE TABLE `sky_article_comment` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  `objectid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '文章',
  `pid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上级评论',
  `createtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '2018-07-02 18:52:01' COMMENT '创建时间',
  `content` text CHARACTER SET utf8 COMMENT '内容',
  `ip` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'ip',
  `ip_city` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '所在城市',
  `love_num` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '点赞数',
  `imgsdata` text CHARACTER SET utf8 COMMENT '图集',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `objectid` (`objectid`,`status`) ,
  KEY `userid` (`userid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT
sky_article_data:
CREATE TABLE `sky_article_data` (
  `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  `content` mediumtext CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `createtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '2018-09-10 09:01:01',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT
sky_attach:
CREATE TABLE `sky_attach` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `dateline` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上传用户',
  `file_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文件名称',
  `file_url` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文件地址',
  `file_size` decimal(11,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '文件大小',
  `file_type` varchar(12) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文件后缀类型',
  `file_group` varchar(12) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文件归类名称',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=11 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='文件管理'
sky_badip:
CREATE TABLE `sky_badip` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `ip` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'ip',
  `createtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '2018-11-18 18:56:01',
  `content` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='ip黑名单'
sky_badphone:
CREATE TABLE `sky_badphone` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `telephone` varchar(15) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '手机号',
  `createtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '2018-11-18 18:56:01',
  `content` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='手机黑名单'
sky_bankcard:
CREATE TABLE `sky_bankcard` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `yhk_name` varchar(15) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '银行名称',
  `yhk_haoma` varchar(24) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '银行卡号码',
  `yhk_huming` varchar(15) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '银行卡户名',
  `telephone` varchar(18) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '电话',
  `yhk_address` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '开户地址',
  `paytype` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '支付方式  支付宝 银行卡 微信 ',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='银行账号'
sky_blacklist:
CREATE TABLE `sky_blacklist` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='黑名单'
sky_blacklist_post:
CREATE TABLE `sky_blacklist_post` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `siteid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `dateline` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `etime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='禁言'
sky_category:
CREATE TABLE `sky_category` (
  `catid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `tablename` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '表名',
  `pid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上级分类',
  `cname` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `orderindex` smallint(6) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序',
  `type_id` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '类型',
  `cat_tpl` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '栏目模板',
  `list_tpl` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '列表模板',
  `show_tpl` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '详情模板',
  `title` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题',
  `keywords` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '关键字',
  `description` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '描述',
  `status` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态 ',
  `level` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '层级',
  `topic_num` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '主题数',
  `comment_num` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '评论数',
  `last_post` text CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL COMMENT '最后发布',
  `logo` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT '/static/images/category_logo.jpg' COMMENT 'logo',
  PRIMARY KEY (`catid`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='分类'
sky_checkin:
CREATE TABLE `sky_checkin` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `siteid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `day` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `mood` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `content` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `type_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `ip` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `t_u_day` (`type_id`,`userid`,`day`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_checkin_index:
CREATE TABLE `sky_checkin_index` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `type_id` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '签到类型 1圈子签到',
  `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户id',
  `dateline` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '时间',
  `grade` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '积分 连续签到几次',
  `last_day` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `last_ip` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '签到ip',
  `all_times` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '签到总次数',
  `is_valid` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '1有效 2无效',
  `gold` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '金币',
  `days` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '连续签到次数',
  `siteid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '分站id',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`,`type_id`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_city:
CREATE TABLE `sky_city` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `lat` decimal(9,6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.000000' COMMENT '纬度',
  `lng` decimal(9,6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.000000' COMMENT '经度',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  `isrecommend` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT
sky_config:
CREATE TABLE `sky_config` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `siteid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `qqid` varchar(22) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `qqkey` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `wbid` varchar(22) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `wbkey` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `tbid` varchar(22) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `tbkey` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `tbpid` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `phone_on` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `phone_reg` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `phone_user` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `phone_pwd` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `phone_num` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `smtphost` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `smtpport` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `smtpemail` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `smtpuser` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `smtppwd` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `water_on` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `water_type` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `water_pos` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `water_str` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `water_img` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `water_size` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `rewrite_on` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `spread_on` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `spread_discount` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `spread_money` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `spread_type` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `grade_on` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `opentime` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `starthour` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `endhour` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `startminute` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `endminute` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `showweek` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `minprice` decimal(8,1) NOT NULL,
  `alipay` tinyint(4) NOT NULL,
  `wxpay` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `tenpay` tinyint(4) NOT NULL,
  `rewrite_type` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `bdmapkey` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `comment_status_check` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `activity_topic_status_check` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0',
  `ob_gzip` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0',
  `express_fee` smallint(6) DEFAULT '0',
  `express_fee_add` smallint(6) DEFAULT '0',
  `order_unpay` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0',
  `hotsearch` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `kf_qq` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `kf_ww` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `order_first_discount` decimal(7,2) DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '首次折扣',
  `order_first_money` decimal(7,2) DEFAULT '10000.00' COMMENT '首次满多少减多少',
  `moneypay` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `fenqi` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `fenqi_lilv` decimal(7,2) DEFAULT '0.01' COMMENT '分期利率',
  `shoplistshow` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '店铺列表展示',
  `has_printer` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '开启打印机',
  `plugin_kdyuan` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '校园快递',
  `plugin_kdyuan_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '校园快递推广类型',
  `plugin_kdyuan_mi` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '校园快递推广范围',
  `rurl301` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '301跳转',
  `bdmapkey_php` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL COMMENT '百度地图服务端',
  `sms_qianming` varchar(16) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '短信签名',
  `sms_type` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '短信类型',
  `reg_invitecode` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '邀请码',
  `s_bank_name` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `s_bank_user` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `s_bank_num` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_coupon:
CREATE TABLE `sky_coupon` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `money` decimal(9,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.0' COMMENT '价格',
  `amount` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '数量',
  `etime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '2019-12-13 01:02:03' COMMENT '截止日期',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  `get_num` smallint(6) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '领取人数',
  `use_num` smallint(6) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '使用人数',
  `lower_money` decimal(9,1) DEFAULT '0.0' COMMENT '最低使用价格',
  `imgurl` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `limit_num` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '限制领取数',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_coupon_user:
CREATE TABLE `sky_coupon_user` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `coupon_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '优惠券',
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '领取时间',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '使用状态',
  `notice_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上次通知',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_crontab:
CREATE TABLE `sky_crontab` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `url` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务地址',
  `crontime` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '执行时间',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='定时任务'
sky_dataapi:
CREATE TABLE `sky_dataapi` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(40) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `word` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `type_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `equation` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `info` text CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `content` mediumtext CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `word` (`word`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_daysn:
CREATE TABLE `sky_daysn` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,

  `userid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `truename` varchar(16) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '真实姓名',
  `user_card` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '身份证号码',
  `income` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '收入',
  `dateline` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间',
  `lasttime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间',
  `telephone` char(16) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '手机号码',
  `is_auth` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `content` mediumtext CHARACTER SET utf8 COMMENT '详细信息',
  `info` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '简介',
  `true_user_head` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全身照',
  PRIMARY KEY (`userid`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_user_black:
CREATE TABLE `sky_user_black` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户',
  `buserid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '被拉黑用户',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_user_expand:
CREATE TABLE `sky_user_expand` (
  `uid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `content` text CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`uid`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_user_group:
CREATE TABLE `sky_user_group` (
  `groupid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `groupname` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `access` text CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL COMMENT '权限',
  PRIMARY KEY (`groupid`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_user_invitecode:
CREATE TABLE `sky_user_invitecode` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `icode` varchar(8) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`) ,
  KEY `icode` (`icode`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='邀请码'
sky_user_lastaddr:
CREATE TABLE `sky_user_lastaddr` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户',
  `nickname` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '联系人',
  `telephone` varchar(18) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '联系电话',
  `address` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '联系地址',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_user_password:
CREATE TABLE `sky_user_password` (
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `password` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '登录密码',
  `paypwd` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '支付密码',
  `salt` varchar(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '密码串',
  PRIMARY KEY (`userid`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='用户密码'
sky_user_rank:
CREATE TABLE `sky_user_rank` (
  `id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `rank_name` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `min_grade` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '最低积分',
  `max_grade` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '最高分',
  `discount` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '折扣',
  `logo` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '等级logo',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_user_vip:
CREATE TABLE `sky_user_vip` (
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `starttime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '开始时间',
  `firsttime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '首次购买',
  `endtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结束时间',
  `stype` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型',
  PRIMARY KEY (`userid`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_weixin:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `token` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `title` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态 1显示',
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `domain` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `catid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `logo` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `imgurl` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `isrecommend` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `imgsdata` text CHARACTER SET utf8,
  `appid` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `appkey` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '公众帐号secert',
  `isshow` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `ysid` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `shopid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `wx_username` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `wx_pwd` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `enkey` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `mchid` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '商户号',
  `mchkey` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '商户支付密钥',
  `sslcert_path` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '支付cer证书',
  `sslkey_path` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '支付key证书',
  `openlogin` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0直接登录 1三方绑定',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_weixin_command:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_command` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `wid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `title` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `command` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `type_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `content` text CHARACTER SET utf8,
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `fun` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT '32',
  `isdefault` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0',
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `sc_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `wid` (`wid`) ,
  KEY `command` (`command`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_weixin_menu:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_menu` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `wid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `pid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `orderindex` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `title` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `w_type` varchar(10) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT '类型',
  `w_key` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `w_url` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `sc_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `content` text CHARACTER SET utf8 COMMENT '内容',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`) ,
  KEY `wid` (`wid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
sky_weixin_reply:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_reply` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `status` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0',
  `openid` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `msgtype` char(10) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `createtime` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `content` text CHARACTER SET utf8,
  `msgid` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `picurl` varchar(250) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `mediaid` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `thumbmediaid` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `format` varchar(12) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `location_x` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `location_y` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `scale` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `label` varchar(200) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `title` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` varchar(500) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `url` varchar(150) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `wid` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `fromusername` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `tousername` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,

sky_weixin_sucai:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_sucai` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,

  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `content` mediumtext CHARACTER SET utf8,
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `pid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `imgurl` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT '',
  `wid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `description` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `linkurl` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

sky_weixin_user:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_user` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `openid` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `add_time` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `last_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `del_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `nickname` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `sex` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,
  `city` varchar(12) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `country` varchar(24) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `province` varchar(12) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `user_head` varchar(225) CHARACTER SET utf8 DEFAULT NULL,
  `update_time` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `reply_num` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `wid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

  KEY `openid` (`openid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
